page.title: 02The Life of a P.K
page.content: First of all P.K stands for parsons kid, which I happen unfortunately, to be. Take it from me if your dad's the local vicar your life is not gonna be worth living. For a start vicars don't earn much money and all your mates at school don't seem to understand why you haven't got the latest craze. " I spose you give all your money to the poor " I ask you what money ? Theres the teasing as well. "Holy" "Good" and because I have glasses and am about to have a brace "Four eyes" "Goggles" and "Mesh mouth". Mind you I like being who I am it's fun. One monday I will describe to you. I woke up late, rushed downstairs, ate my breakfast, called my brother, fed the rabbit, grabbed my bag and ran to school. School was uneventful I got home, played my guitar, had tea, watched t.v and went to bed. Here you have Me. Caroline Sceats
